frame.name: Probability
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame characterizes the likelihood that a <fen>Hypothetical_event</fen> will happen as a position on a scale of impossible to inevitable. The likelihood can expressed as numerical <fen>Odds</fen> or a metaphorical representation of the <fen>Position</fen> on a scale.
<ex>There's a <fex name="Position">20 %</fex> <t>chance</t> that you'll succeed.</ex> <ex>The <t>odds</t> that he'll actually do it are <fex name="Odds">one in a million</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Odds
FE.definition:
<def-root>A numerical representation of the probability that a Hypothetical_event will occur.
<ex>There's a <fex name="Odds">95 %</fex> <t>chance</t> of rain today.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Position
FE.definition:
<def-root>A metaphorical representation of the position on the scale of likelihood that the Hypothetical_event will occur.
<ex><t>Chances</t> are <fex name="Position">slim</fex> that he'll pull through.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Hypothetical_event
FE.definition:
<def-root>The event that is expected to happen with a certain likelihood.
<ex>He's got a small <t>chance</t> <fex name="Hypothetical_event">of making it out alive</fex>.</ex></def-root>
